allow:
Bash(git -C D:/CoolSCool commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add explanations to all questions, user profile system, and Science subjects for classes 6-10

- Generate and embed explanations into 29,757/29,780 JSON question files \(99.9% coverage\)
- Export existing DB explanations to JSON files, then fill gaps via Claude API
- JSON files are now the single source of truth for questions + explanations
- Update all 3 seed scripts to read explanation fields with COALESCE upsert
- Add user profile system: migration, model, controller, routes \(backend\)
- Add profile page with form, API service, navigation link \(frontend\)
- Capture Google OAuth names into user_profiles on login
- Filter subjects by classRange: Science \(1-5\), Physics/Chemistry/Biology \(6-10\)
- Move Class 5 Maths files to class5/ directory
- Add export-explanations-from-db.ts and generate-explanations-to-files.ts scripts
- Clean up old generate-explanations.ts and debug validation files

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C D:/CoolSCool commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove temp files accidentally included

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C D:/CoolSCool commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix type errors blocking Vercel deployment by removing unused Record<string, string> match type

Match question type was removed previously but Record<string, string> remained in answer
type signatures, causing TypeScript build failures on Vercel.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C D:/CoolSCool commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix profile validation errors and add required fields with completion progress circle

Backend:
- Fix Joi validation to accept lowercase enum values matching frontend selects
- Add country field to validation schema and model mapping
- Allow empty strings for date, gender, relationship, learning style fields

Frontend:
- Fix select options to send lowercase values \(male, female, father, etc.\)
- Add required field indicators \(*\) for: first name, last name, DOB, gender, grade, guardian name, guardian email
- Add client-side validation preventing save without required fields
- Add profile completion circle showing percentage of all fields filled
- Add red border styling for fields with validation errors
- Clean empty strings to null before sending to backend

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
